topic.title: Highly encrypted chat for the normal web. Signal for desktop.
topic.body: Cut in line with this code: http://l.aunch.us/yJziM

topic.title: What is your VPN of choise?
topic.body: My old VPN is going to expire in few months so I thought that you could give your opinion on that matter. My Current VPN is ShadeYouVpn and I'm currently testing AirVPN.

topic.title: ZeroNet vs i2p
topic.body: ZeroNet is faster and more reliable but i2p is more anonymous. What do you guys think about this topic?

topic.title: What is the best SeedBox for downloading movies
topic.body: I'm looking for cheap, secure and no logs on SeedBox. What do you prefer? Currently I use VPN but I wan't to test SeedBox.

2_1MCsyW6W243LY69ZYm99XbV3M8Gbbrp5hF.body: From these few days I've been testing AirVPN. I can tell at least that I can get about 40Mbps on Amsterdam's servers and it's almost double the speed than ShadeYouVpn's fastest servers at Ukraine and the encryption is 2048 RSA on ShadeYouVpn and 4096 RSA on AirVPN.

> [mkrmec](#comment_2_1DWiaV2NYmW7FKZAgRf2kfgLiS6gRTEBhT): I'm on PureVPN and I wouldn't recommend it...
> 
> Slow bandwidth speeds on P2P servers (you gotta keep switching servers)
> not enough P2P servers (categorized)
> Torrent downloads are limited (there's probably a limit on how many connections you have open)
> PureVPN client is laggy as fuck, it just stops working and takes some 10 seconds to start moving again.
> Pings are sucky
> my local server (same country) had 500ms ping and 4 mbit speed WTF!!??
> Good support though, I think all they do day in day out is search for good servers because people complain.
> No list of servers by category, and no live pings between servers like AirVPN has
> 
> I tried my time at AirVPN also... those speed were suckfest also at 15 mbits MAX!!
> If anybody has some good VPN to share, please do so.

What about your internet speed without VPN? Mine is 100Mpbs Down and 5Mpbs Up.

My friend found this document about most of the VPN providers. The information on this looks valid. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FJTvWT5RHFSYuEoFVpAeQjuQPU4BVzbOigT0xebxTOw/htmlview?sle=true#gid=0
